name: reverse_index_at_scroll_top
description: RI (ESC M) at the top of a scroll region triggers scroll-down within the region
comment: Fill rows 0-2: AAAAA / BBBBB / CCCCC. Set scroll region 1;3 (rows 0-2), cursor at (0,0). RI scrolls region down: row 0=blank, row 1=AAAAA, row 2=BBBBB. CCCCC is lost.
